title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, generate, embeddings, model ops.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community-built function-calling examples: weather, SQLite, web search, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma; ingest PDFs and ask questions offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript/JavaScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package to chat, generate, embed and manage models through a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history and multi-line editing for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-compatible UI that can proxy to Ollama backend, giving a polished desktop app experience.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault for summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generation, embeddings and model management; targets .NET 6+.
